author: Cristiano Lima
title: Privacy agenda threatened in West’s virus fight
description: Years of efforts to safeguard personal data in the U.S. and Europe are running headlong into calls for "drastic actions" to counter the pandemic.
content:
But some advocates are expressing a willingness to make trade-offs, at least during the crisis.
"This is a time for drastic actions and some of that may involve more invasive data processing than at other times," said Justin Brookman, director of consumer pr… [+8476 chars]
